title: Chinese New Year 2024: Costco Shoppers Opt for Gold Bar Chocolates Over Expensive Gold Bars
text:
2024-01-07 09:04 Comprehensive report by United
News Network
The Spring Festival is approaching, and many people are preparing to give red envelopes to their elders to express their filial piety. Some netizens thought that they had received a lot of year-end bonuses this year. They originally planned to buy gold bars at Costco, an American-style store. They wanted to buy gold bars with dragon patterns on them. However, they were immediately discouraged when they saw the price. They had to buy “small gold bar chocolates” first and then buy them. Packed in a transparent box to create a glittering atmosphere. Others also believe that gold bar chocolates are suitable for saying goodbye or giving to relatives during the New Year.
a netizenHe posted a post on the Facebook group “Costco Product Experience Honesty” and said that he was thinking about receiving a lot of year-end bonuses this year, and happened to find out that Costco had launched gold bars with dragon patterns on them. He originally planned to give them to his parents when he returned to his hometown during the Chinese New Year. , which made them very happy, but when they actually went to the store and saw the price, they immediately gave up.
The netizen said that after wandering around Costco, he finally decided to buy his parents’ favorite “joyful little gold bar chocolate”. It happened to be on sale right now, which meant he was saving money and being practical. He would then pack it in a transparent box to create a Swiss-like look. In an atmosphere full of energy and glittering gold, he praised himself as “smart and considerate”
Netizens originally wanted to buy the gold nugget pictured above, but it was too expensive and had to buy the gold bar chocolate pictured above instead. The pictures are taken from other people’s comments, “I feel like the elders will like it very much”, “I can’t afford gold bars, so buy gold coin chocolates instead”, “My parents are happy to receive anything”, “Elderly people will like these candies with red and gold packaging, treat them The guests are also very respectable.” “This 70% dark chocolate is delicious but not sweet.” “My mother took the chocolate and hid it in the closet.”
Others commented, “The golden light is shining and joyful”, “It’s perfect to buy a few to put on the table during the Chinese New Year to bring joy and happiness”, “I will keep working hard on the real gold nuggets, I hope I can buy one for each of my parents next year”, “Take this and say goodbye”, “For the Chinese New Year, I need to prepare some festive candies. My family always prepares some peanut cakes and the like.” “I sometimes buy them. The main thing is that they are not too sweet or too bitter.”
